android.preference
类 DialogPreference

java.lang.Object
  android.preference.Preference
      android.preference.DialogPreference
所有已实现的接口：
DialogInterface.OnClickListener, DialogInterface.OnDismissListener, PreferenceManager.OnActivityDestroyListener, Comparable<Preference>
直接已知子类：
EditTextPreference, ListPreference
public abstract class DialogPreference
extends Preference
implements DialogInterface.OnClickListener, DialogInterface.OnDismissListener, PreferenceManager.OnActivityDestroyListener

A base class for Preference objects that are dialog-based. These preferences will, when clicked, open a dialog showing the actual preference controls.

方法详细信息

setDialogTitle

public void setDialogTitle(CharSequence dialogTitle)
Sets the title of the dialog. This will be shown on subsequent dialogs.

参数：
dialogTitle - The title.

setDialogTitle

public void setDialogTitle(int dialogTitleResId)
参数：
dialogTitleResId - The dialog title as a resource.
另请参见：
setDialogTitle(CharSequence)

getDialogTitle

public CharSequence getDialogTitle()
Returns the title to be shown on subsequent dialogs.

返回：
The title.

setDialogMessage

public void setDialogMessage(CharSequence dialogMessage)
Sets the message of the dialog. This will be shown on subsequent dialogs.

This message forms the content View of the dialog and conflicts with list-based dialogs, for example. If setting a custom View on a dialog via setDialogLayoutResource(int), include a text View with ID android.R.id#message and it will be populated with this message.

参数：
dialogMessage - The message.

setDialogMessage

public void setDialogMessage(int dialogMessageResId)
参数：
dialogMessageResId - The dialog message as a resource.
另请参见：
setDialogMessage(CharSequence)

getDialogMessage

public CharSequence getDialogMessage()
Returns the message to be shown on subsequent dialogs.

返回：
The message.

setDialogIcon

public void setDialogIcon(Drawable dialogIcon)
Sets the icon of the dialog. This will be shown on subsequent dialogs.

参数：
dialogIcon - The icon, as a Drawable.

setDialogIcon

public void setDialogIcon(int dialogIconRes)
Sets the icon (resource ID) of the dialog. This will be shown on subsequent dialogs.

参数：
dialogIconRes - The icon, as a resource ID.

getDialogIcon

public Drawable getDialogIcon()
Returns the icon to be shown on subsequent dialogs.

返回：
The icon, as a Drawable.

setPositiveButtonText

public void setPositiveButtonText(CharSequence positiveButtonText)
Sets the text of the positive button of the dialog. This will be shown on subsequent dialogs.

参数：
positiveButtonText - The text of the positive button.

参数：
positiveButtonTextResId - The positive button text as a resource.
另请参见：
setPositiveButtonText(CharSequence)

Returns the text of the positive button to be shown on subsequent dialogs.

返回：
The text of the positive button.

返回：

setDialogLayoutResource

public void setDialogLayoutResource(int dialogLayoutResId)
Sets the layout resource that is inflated as the View to be shown as the content View of subsequent dialogs.

参数：
dialogLayoutResId - The layout resource ID to be inflated.
另请参见：
setDialogMessage(CharSequence)

getDialogLayoutResource

public int getDialogLayoutResource()
Returns the layout resource that is used as the content View for subsequent dialogs.

返回：
The layout resource.

onClick

public void onClick(DialogInterface dialog,
                    int which)
从接口 DialogInterface.OnClickListener 复制的描述
This method will be invoked when a button in the dialog is clicked.

指定者：
接口 DialogInterface.OnClickListener 中的 onClick
参数：
dialog - The dialog that received the click.
which - The button that was clicked (e.g. DialogInterface.BUTTON1) or the position of the item clicked.

onDismiss

public void onDismiss(DialogInterface dialog)
从接口 DialogInterface.OnDismissListener 复制的描述
This method will be invoked when the dialog is dismissed.

指定者：
接口 DialogInterface.OnDismissListener 中的 onDismiss
参数：
dialog - The dialog that was dismissed will be passed into the method.

getDialog

public Dialog getDialog()
Gets the dialog that is shown by this preference.

返回：
The dialog, or null if a dialog is not being shown.

onActivityDestroy

public void onActivityDestroy()
See Activity's onDestroy.

指定者：
接口 PreferenceManager.OnActivityDestroyListener 中的 onActivityDestroy
